K Ganga Siva Kumar Reddy

Q.1

a) population mean = 72 bpm
sample mean = 69 bpm

b) H₀ → μ ≤ 69 bpm
H₁ → μ > 69 bpm

c) Distance interms of standard errors
S.E. = $\frac{\sqrt{n}}{n} = \frac{10}{\sqrt{69}} = \frac{10}{8} = 1.25$

d) z-score = $\frac{72 - 69}{1.25} = \frac{3}{1.25} = 2.4$

e)

Q.2

a) ρ(5) = 20% = 0.2
probability of all incoming messages are spam P(A) (prior).

b) ρ(A/B) is the posterior, posterior is the updated probability after getting evidence.

c) ρ(B/A)ρ(A) + ρ(B/Aⁿ)ρ(Aⁿ)
(0.9)(0.1) + (0.05)(0.95) = 0.13

d) The posterior probability will be high, because it is the updated probability after getting evidence, it will be finalized.
